DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate Venezuela 's National System Child Youth Orchestras , good know `` El Sistema '' .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Effects Musical Training Child Development Venezuela Orchestra Program ( El Sistema )
DOC.detailed_description: The randomize control trial conduct 16 music center Venezuela May 2012 November 2013 , population 6-14 year old seek entry program . During application period ( May-July 2012 ) , 2,603 guardian ( experimental cluster ) apply behalf 2,999 6-14 year old . Approximately half guardian randomly offer early admission September 2012 , rest offer admission September 2013 . Baseline follow-up data collect outcomes explored full-group specific sub-groups ( child less educated mother , boy girl expose violence ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Excess demand 5 geographic area : 24 music center across 5 state identify experimental site base likelihood excess demand family 201213 academic year . Apply protocol : Experimental site agree accept write application guardian May 7 July 8 , 2012 ( without inform guardian admission decision randomization ) . Directors consent participate experiment receive training experimental protocol . Children eligible apply would 6 14 year old September 1 , 2012 . Sites receive application 2,603 guardian behalf 2,999 child . Exclusion criterion : Music center level : Two site exclude director decline follow experimental protocol , six exclude insufficient demand carry randomize experiment . Child/guardian level : By prior agreement , site director could award early admission small number applicant ( 5 % position ) . In eight site , 85 child ( 74 guardian ) exclude study enter position allot site director . Children also lose study parental consent child assent give .
